title: Five-Star Brisbane CBD Spicers Boutique Luxury with Sunset Rooftop Bar
description: Indulge in five-star urban glamour at Spicers Balfour Hotel, a jewel in Queensland's much-loved New Farm area. While the surrounding streets are abuzz with restaurants, a cinema, pubs and boutiques, find a restful retreat at the hotel's rooftop bar, a prime spot to enjoy the sunset. At Balfour Kitchen & Bar, feast on award-winning Vietnamese fare created with fresh local produce and sustainably sourced seafood and meats, or treat yourself to a famous Balfour High Tea, perfect for any occasion.
offer_address: 37 Balfour Street, New Farm, Queensland 4005, Australia
